definition: to dare to/to be brave enough to

sentences.english: The principal must be hard-working, good at learning and enterprising.
sentences.chinese: 校長必須是一個勤奮學習，善於學習，勇於進取的人。

sentences.english: Serendipitous people are more fearless about trying something new.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾人們會更加勇於嘗試新鮮事物。

sentences.english: Hu calls on teachers to embrace innovation.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤要求教師要勇於創新。

sentences.english: Create a culture based on innovation and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 建立以“勇於創新，精誠合作”爲基礎的企業文化。

sentences.english: The courage to go off is dedicated to each person.
sentences.chinese: 騰飛是獻給每位勇於進取的人。

sentences.english: Sanhui people will march on further for greater target.
sentences.chinese: 勇於開拓的“三惠人”將目光投向了更遠大的目標。

sentences.english: The man, who can express his apology as soon as he knows what he did just now is wrong, is a real wise.
sentences.chinese: 立即表達心中的想法，勇於認錯纔是真正的勇者。

sentences.english: A great scholar and poet, Wen Yiduo was brave in absorbing all exotic nutrition beneficial to his pursuit of poetic art.
sentences.chinese: 聞一多在詩藝追求中勇於汲納一切有益的外來營養。

sentences.english: "Innovative, brave in exploitation" is our persistent pursuit.
sentences.chinese: “敢於創新，勇於開拓”是我執著的追求。

sentences.english: Dare to face the reality, have the courage to take responsibility, will progress.
sentences.chinese: 罌敢於面對現實，勇於承擔責任，纔會不斷進步。

sentences.english: Companies need to learn how to unlearn , to slough off yesterdays wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 公司要學會怎樣放棄，要勇於拋棄昨日的成就。

sentences.english: Generalists need to be versatile and open to failure.
sentences.chinese: 通才需具備多方面才能，且勇於面對失敗。

sentences.english: With self-confidence, open mind, positive and creativity.
sentences.chinese: 自信，思維開闊，積極進取並勇於創新。

sentences.english: Open your mind to new ideas and activites, and don't be afraid to try.
sentences.chinese: 勇於接受新觀點新舉措，不要害怕嘗試。

sentences.english: Woe unto them that are mighty to drink wine, and men of strength to mingle strong drink
sentences.chinese: 禍哉，那些勇於飲酒，以能力調濃酒的人。

sentences.english: The main thing is not to give way to a famous authority but courageously defend your opinion.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵要記住不要屈服於權威，要勇於保持自己的觀點。
